Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya scored 40 runs off 37 balls
Dinesh Karthik scored 1 run off 2 balls
India won by 4 wickets (with 0 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma: 'We are in a better position than the last T20 World Cup'
Kumble: 'India need to adapt to conditions but can't be conservative'
Babar Azam: 'They have won us enough matches' - on middle order
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma: 'We need to do a lot of things right to win tthe WC'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The last three India-Pakistan T20Is have all been played in Dubai, a venue where the toss influences results disproportionately, and have all been won by the chasing side.
Chasing teams have won each of the last five completed T20Is at the MCG as well.
The team winning the toss may not be quite so crucial at the MCG.
